snippet: “Julius Caesar,” a calypso “Taming of the Shrew” and short plays by Bertolt Brecht are among the free theater productions being presented outdoors this weekend in New York City.
lead_paragraph: “Julius Caesar,” a calypso “Taming of the Shrew” and short plays by Bertolt Brecht are among the free theater productions being presented outdoors this weekend in New York City.

headline.main: Free Theater in the Parks (and Parking Lot)
